question: In an LCR series circuit, the value of only capacitance C is varied. The resulting variation of resonance frequency <katex>$f_{0}$</katex> as a function of C can be represented as
explanation: The graph of <katex>$f_0$</katex> vs <katex>$C$</katex> will be a curve that decreases as C increases, similar to a rectangular hyperbola but sharper. Graph (C) correctly represents this inverse relationship.
